entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
